items.title: Repo cleanup for Vercel migration
items.description: Clean up repo before implementing new operator surface. Archive legacy Netlify config and static HTML. Preserve /resume redirect capability. Prepare for Next.js + Vercel deployment.

items.title: Operator Surface Rendering
items.description: E-001: Single-page layout with minimal editorial design. All content visible via vertical scroll only. Large typography, generous spacing, no decorative elements.

items.title: Credibility Signal Content
items.description: E-002: Hero statement, What I Do section, Availability section, and Proof of Work links. Signal without explanation.

items.title: Contact Enablement
items.description: E-003: Direct contact via email and LinkedIn. No forms or friction.

items.title: Analytics and Optimization
items.description: E-004: Analytics integration. Explicitly excluded from v0 scope.

items.title: US-001: Single page without navigation
items.description:
As a viewer, I see all content on a single page without navigation.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Given I load the site
- When the page renders
- Then all sections are visible via vertical scroll only

items.title: US-002: Minimal editorial layout
items.description:
As a viewer, I experience a minimal editorial layout.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Given the page renders
- Then typography is large, spacing is generous, and no decorative elements distract

items.title: US-003: Single-sentence hero statement
items.description:
As a viewer, I see a single-sentence hero statement.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Given the hero section
- Then exactly one sentence is displayed with no subtitle stack

items.title: US-004: Scannable What I Do section
items.description:
As a viewer, I can scan what the operator does in under 5 seconds.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Given the "What I Do" section
- Then no more than three concrete bullet points are shown

items.title: US-005: Proof of Work links
items.description:
As a viewer, I can validate credibility via external links.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Given the Proof of Work section
- Then links are displayed without descriptive text

items.title: US-006: Frictionless contact
items.description:
As a viewer, I can contact directly without friction.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Given the Contact section
- Then email and LinkedIn links are visible and clickable
